replies.msg:
好似母公司畀人收購左
In news that will have little if any effect on Shenmue III but is worth noting anyway, THQ Nordic has announced that on this Valentine's Day it will be acquiring Koch Media GmbH, including its subsidiary Deep Silver.

Deep Silver signed a global publishing deal last summer with Ys Net, expanding the scope of development for Shenmue III. Today's announcement confirms that all existing arrangements will proceed unhindered by the acquisition, with Koch Media continuing to operate as a separate entity and no plans for restructuring or cost saving measures.

THQ Nordic, formerly Nordic Games until its purchase of the THQ brand in 2014, is known for a variety of titles including Ori and the Blind Forest, The Vanishing of Ethan Carter, and the upcoming Darksiders III. This acquisition of Koch Media forms part of an ongoing strategy to expand its business and suite of intellectual properties.

The Shenmue IP of course still belongs to Sega, with Yu Suzuki only having the license to make Shenmue III on their say-so. Therefore Shenmue does not join the likes of Saints Row, Dead Island, and Metro as Deep Silver franchises now under the ownership of THQ Nordic.

The only aspect of this new arrangement that might affect Shenmue III is a positive one, with Deep Silver and Koch Media now able to share in the resources of their new parent group, potentially opening new avenues for marketing and distribution of the game.

Most likely we, as consumers, will not be able to discern any difference, other than perhaps the once improbable sight of the THQ brand in the credits of Shenmue III. But given how much of those credits will be opened up to Kickstarter and Slacker Backer donors, it probably won't be the most unusual line in there...

https://youtu.be/ckAlNyMWfIc

replies.msg:
The schedule for next week's MAGIC Monaco has been announced, meaning we now know when Yu Suzuki will be appearing throughout the day on February 24th to meet fans and share new Shenmue III content.

The main Shenmue conference begins at 10:40am, which we anticipate lasting around an hour.

Suzuki-san will then be signing autographs from 3pm, and is likely to return with something of interest during co-producer Cédric Biscay's "Crazy Time" presentation, which begins at 5:10pm and showcases projects involving MAGIC promoters Shibuya Productions.

All times are given in Central European Time (UTC+1).

While there will be no official stream during the event, the fan community will be doing its best to share all major content as quickly as possible. We recommend watching the Shenmue Master page for updates.

The full schedule of all conferences and autograph sessions can be found at these two links:

http://www.magic-ip.com/en/activity/conferences-4/

http://www.magic-ip.com/en/activity/autograph-signing-2/

replies.msg: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rg1PJszTIqk

Notes from Yu Suzuki's conference

Thanks to the consoles he wanted to make a game without these limitations. So he started working on an RPG for the Saturn.
He wanted to tell a long story. And when the Dreamcast came out they needed a "killer title." Role that has been entrusted to Shenmue.
Making a RPG out of nothing is a long, resource-intensive process and initially used Virtua Fighter as a base.
In addition, Virtua Fighter had an already established combat system, which was convenient.
As he wanted to make a RPG, he started playing other games of the genre.
While playing, he realized that this type of game was stressing him. He wanted to create a game that he could play more easily.
He felt that having face-to-face talking with characters in traditional RPGs was compelling. He therefore wanted to create a more flexible system.
For Shenmue, the story was very important. So before developing the game, he wrote a book in which the story was written. This story has not changed since this original writing.
This book is not kept in a safe but in a computer.
Shenmue 1 was small enough for an open world. So he wanted a bigger world with more characters in Shenmue 2.
It was with Virtua Fighter 2 that realized that 3D could be interesting from the point of view of business (yes they left on the arcade for some reason).
Yu Suzuki recalls that he does not play much video games and that he is inspired by the news and his personal experiences to create his games.
He likes driving a lot. But he does not mean if he drives like in Outurn not to be pinched.


For Outrun he came to Europe to research and it is a red Ferrari seen in front of the Monaco casino that gave him the idea of the racing car.
He thinks that it is always possible to innovate in video games. Meanwhile, I feel the fans of Shenmue losing patience ...
He explains that he hates the position of producer in the creation of a video game.
When you are a producer you take care of the non-creative side: budget, schedule, etc. And there are always conflicts with the creative part represented by the director.
He explains that holding both positions at the same time is very difficult.
His roles are varied as a director: to say that Ryo can not move or speak in a certain way, etc.
Shenmue III is happening in China in 1987 so he has to study the country of that time and determine things like the price of a can in China at this point in history.
To work on the game, what was important for him was finding people who knew and loved Shenmue. He likes people who offer things.
For him, a key position is that of programmer. He was himself a programmer at the origin. Knowing the Unreal Engine 4 is very important too.
He thinks he has a very good team right now.

I know why there are not many people who are very disappointed with the magic 2018.

because there are not many people here who speak French and so they did not understand the words of Cedric Biscay at the magic 2018 press conference.

I understood his words. I will explain why I am very upset.

So there were only 4 images and this teaser extended which was shown secretly at Gamescom.
it is actually the result of the shenmue version dating back 1 year and half ago because it was planned for the PSX 2016.

Thank you Cédric:

Thank you for making us believe that the 4 images shown during the press conference, was only a small part of the content that was to be unveiled.
Teasing as he said.

Thank you for making us crazy for nothing by telling us that we would have tears of joy when we see what the game looks like currently. Because we were supposed to see this.

Sorry Shendream but you will not be able to protect him this time.

I listened again to the Magic 2018 press conference to highlight Cédric's precise words about what should be shown at magic concerning SHENMUE.
Thank you Shenmue master for those proofs.

i translated for you those words but check yourself if you want.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1f5M6u51wpo

7 minutes and 34 seconds of the video, Cedric says this:

"It' will be be a great moment to unveil the new stages of the game, and to unveil the new game mechanics.
It will be a conference and a day under the sign of Shenmue "

40 minutes and 38 seconds of the video, Cedric says this:
"We will show, at the Magic, things moves."

things moves means gameplay or in-game video

48 minutes and 10 seconds, Cedric says this:

"We will also show exclusive things at the Magic, as videos, trailers and other things".

What we can notice is that he does not use words like "we would like to show".

It was clear.
it was sure that we had to see all that

And it is on those words that I chose to establish my trust.

We are not just anyone.
We are the ones who have kept hoping year after year despite repeated disappointments.

He is supposed to be one of us and understand that we have been disappointed enough.
How dare he afford to say that there will be a lot of contents while he is not able to ensure that this can happen ???

He does not deserve to be part of our fan community.

I would have liked to allow the rage inside me to be expressed, but I will abstain.

if i was him, i will go to isolate myself to do penance in a cave for 15 years.

假希望,騙子

我地又嚟下台灣fans嘅FF


我這十幾年自己腦補了一些故事背景與世界觀，
打出來讓大家聽聽好了。

事件地點：中國
莎花是從古代穿越到現代的人，
但並非莎花擁有長生不老之能力，
而是藉由某個外力賦予她的，
某個藉由鳳凰鏡與龍鏡才能通往的是秘境(或是樹：莎木)
讓莎花吸收，並擁有了超自然力量。

起因於莎花嬰兒時期，家族可能遇到某種大災難，
父母親(中國皇室)就把她安置在可以鎖起門來的秘境中。
而鑰匙就是那兩面鏡子，龍與鳳。
隨後他們便把龍鳳鏡託付給信任的武官(大內高手?)暫先遠離皇宮。
等到災難過去，再接回莎花。
但沒想到莎花的父母並沒逃過命運捉弄，
沒有平安渡過這個危機，至於喪命了，
再也無緣與女兒相見....。

朝野亂世不停，
擁有這兩面鏡子的武官們也回不去了，
深居民間。
鳳與龍鏡，便成這些人的傳家寶收藏了起來。
而受託藏起這些鏡子的武官因不知曉秘鏡在哪，
所以幾百年過去，這件事慢慢轉變成了神話傳說。
鏡子所能開啟的真相，也無人得知真相。

時光推移，
鏡子傳到近代的徒子徒孫，
這些人便因好奇這個古老傳說，
決定相約尋找這個地方，
風風雨雨，歲歲月月，
眾人終於找到這個傳說中的地點。
透過鏡子，打開了門，映入眼廉的是嬰兒時期的莎花。
(註：秘境內的時間是靜止或極慢的)。
他們便抱了她出來 (給某人教養：二代中跟莎花一起住的石匠大叔)。

傳說中的事，竟然是真的，
而真相更是意想不到的。

後來，某些傳人對於秘境的神奇力量，
起了邪念，想利用在非正道上。
卻被某位尚存一絲正義的人阻止了。
這位正義之士，奪走了兩面鏡子，
並再度關起了秘境。
特意從中國遠渡重洋躲到日本。
為了藏起鏡子，
隱居並改名換姓。
取了一個日本名：
-芭月嚴

此時芭月涼也出生了
18年後

莎花18歲，
芭月涼18歲，

命運因為兩面鏡子
糾葛了起來。

我這十幾年自己腦補了一些故事背景與世界觀，
打出來讓大家聽聽好了。

事件地點：中國
莎花是從古代穿越到現代的人，
但並非莎花擁有長生不老之能力，
而是藉由某個外力賦予她的，
某個藉由鳳凰鏡與龍鏡才能通往的是秘境(或是樹：莎木)
讓莎花吸收，並擁有了超自然力量。

起因於莎花嬰兒時期，家族可能遇到某種大災難，
父母親(中國皇室)就把她安置在可以鎖起門來的秘境中。
而鑰匙就是那兩面鏡子，龍與鳳。
隨後他們便把龍鳳鏡託付給信任的武官(大內高手?)暫先遠離皇宮。
等到災難過去，再接回莎花。
但沒想到莎花的父母並沒逃過命運捉弄，
沒有平安渡過這個危機，至於喪命了，
再也無緣與女兒相見....。

朝野亂世不停，
擁有這兩面鏡子的武官們也回不去了，
深居民間。
鳳與龍鏡，便成這些人的傳家寶收藏了起來。
而受託藏起這些鏡子的武官因不知曉秘鏡在哪，
所以幾百年過去，這件事慢慢轉變成了神話傳說。
鏡子所能開啟的真相，也無人得知真相。

時光推移，
鏡子傳到近代的徒子徒孫，
這些人便因好奇這個古老傳說，
決定相約尋找這個地方，
風風雨雨，歲歲月月，
眾人終於找到這個傳說中的地點。
透過鏡子，打開了門，映入眼廉的是嬰兒時期的莎花。
(註：秘境內的時間是靜止或極慢的)。
他們便抱了她出來 (給某人教養：二代中跟莎花一起住的石匠大叔)。

傳說中的事，竟然是真的，
而真相更是意想不到的。

後來，某些傳人對於秘境的神奇力量，
起了邪念，想利用在非正道上。
卻被某位尚存一絲正義的人阻止了。
這位正義之士，奪走了兩面鏡子，
並再度關起了秘境。
特意從中國遠渡重洋躲到日本。
為了藏起鏡子，
隱居並改名換姓。
取了一個日本名：
-芭月嚴

此時芭月涼也出生了
18年後

莎花18歲，
芭月涼18歲，

命運因為兩面鏡子
糾葛了起來。

呢個離譜啲喎
芭月嚴一定本身係日本人黎先啦

開發業者大會（Game Developer Conference，以下簡稱GDC）上，《尼爾》系列的總監橫尾太郎登上了座談會的講台，並和到場的遊戲業者們分享了一些有趣的內容，主要圍繞著如何在不做成開放世界的情況下讓玩家感受到自由的心得。
他說最近在西方遊戲玩家群體中看到了不少關於“開放世界審美疲勞”的話題，而在日本無論是作為業者還是玩家都多少有探討這個話題。開放世界遊戲都有巨大的地圖，很多任務以及諸如鍛造等很多內容，玩家可以投入到遊戲中數千小時依然覺得富有樂趣。不過這種新鮮感也只能持續一段時間，因為有遊戲中會存在太多要做的事情，玩家們反而會覺得因此被束縛住了手腳。
當這種大地圖、多任務和額外元素多到成為“日常”時，就會讓玩家充滿疲憊感。
橫尾太郎認為，遊戲充滿極高的自由度並不一定能給人帶來自由的感覺，這是一種電子遊戲設計上的獨特元素和思路。很多遊戲作者會在遊戲裏加入成噸的任務、隱藏要素或彩蛋等等，而作為玩家們會想要完成全部內容，缺一不可。最後就使得遊戲變得沈悶而繁瑣。
他舉了個例子，在GTA4裏他驚訝地發現居然無法和路人NPC進行對話，而在JRPG裏和城鎮的路人對話是最基本的要素。他無法相信歐美遊戲有著如此大手筆的開發成本卻做不出這樣“基本”的東西。要給玩家自由的感覺，在遊戲設計時就應該從框架構造上出發，而不是做大地圖
橫尾太郎對於“自由感”的看法和我當年與一位朋友探討當下的“開放世界大而空”的感覺差不多。當時我的看法是開放世界遊戲同質化有些嚴重，能像《巫師3》和《塞爾達傳說：曠野之息》這類給人眼前一亮的開放世界作品實在為數不多。當所有東西都在打折時等於沒有打折，遊戲裏所有元素都能自由選擇時等於沒有自由。線性的劇情也能創造出自由的感覺，而空而大的地圖卻不一定能有這種感覺。自由感這種東西只有玩家在進行了對比和體驗之後才能產生，而不是靠宣傳片和遊戲資料。

SEGA Nerds received a small media packet from Sega including additional images and box art: http://www.seganerds.com/2018/04/13/shenmue-i-ii-announced-for-ps4-xbox-one-and-pc/

The image details show the Shenmue pictures were captured at 1,438px × 1,080px and the Shenmue II pictures were captured at 1,920px × 1,080px. We may be able to do some pixel counting and confirm that the games are rendering at those resolutions. I have my fingers crossed that 4k and 60 fps will be announced at some point. Perhaps a 16:9 presentation for the original Shenmue

Edit: Strangely, the official Sega trailer appears to show both Shenmue I & II with a 4:3 presentation AND a 16:9 presentation. Maybe we will get to choose? https://youtu.be/jPtlofIccAk

PS4『莎木 I&II』決定2018年發售！

上週於「SEGA FES 2018」活動中發表了將於2018年針對日本、亞洲推出PS4專用遊戲『莎木 I&II』。
※預計推出繁體中文版

『莎木 I&II』將過去SEGA家庭用遊戲主機・Dreamcast於日本發售的動作冒險『莎木 第一章 橫須賀』與『莎木II』結合成1套PS4平台遊戲。
充滿魅力的登場人物、充滿謎團的浩大劇情；此外，能自由動來動去的廣大世界。
身為3D開放世界的元祖，能稱作是大幅改變遊戲歷史的作品之一的「莎木」，支援FULL HD與改善操作設定與用戶介面等，重製多項要素並在PS4復活。

務必在本款遊戲暢玩從第1作發售至今的19年也不曾褪色的「莎木」世界。
中文官網: http://asia.sega.com/shenmue1-2/cht/
#SEGA #莎木 #繁體中文版

上週於「SEGA FES 2018」活動中發表了將於2018年針對日本、亞洲推出PS4專用遊戲『莎木 I&II』。
※預計推出繁體中文版

『莎木 I&II』將過去SEGA家庭用遊戲主機・Dreamcast於日本發售的動作冒險『莎木 第一章 橫須賀』與『莎木II』結合成1套PS4平台遊戲。
充滿魅力的登場人物、充滿謎團的浩大劇情；此外，能自由動來動去的廣大世界。
身為3D開放世界的元祖，能稱作是大幅改變遊戲歷史的作品之一的「莎木」，支援FULL HD與改善操作設定與用戶介面等，重製多項要素並在PS4復活。

務必在本款遊戲暢玩從第1作發售至今的19年也不曾褪色的「莎木」世界。
中文官網: http://asia.sega.com/shenmue1-2/cht/
